Describe MainInclusionReportKioUmountWrapper here.

 0. ''Availability:''
** In universe.
 0. ''Rationale:''
** Kubuntu progressbar for safely removing removable devices.  For more info see:
         LP Bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/kdebase/+bug/61946

         SPEC: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/kubuntu-remove-media
 0. ''Security:''
** No security incidents.
** No binary running as root.
** Does not open any port.
** No Secunia or CVE entry, as this is yet a Kubuntu native development.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Does not require any configuration.
** It's a simple wrapper around existing KDE programs. Providing the progressdialog only.
** Upstream is member of the Kubuntu community and very active.
 0. ''Standards compliance:''
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All dependencies and build-deps are in main.
